attributes.action: Intorduce minimum speed limits for the middle and outside lanes on motorways
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Reduce congestion on busy motorways by applying minimum speed limits of say 60 mph and 70 mph to the middle and outside lanes. This would prevent slow moving vehicles from blocking lanes and eliminate the empty inside lane/ packed outside lane problem, allowing traffic to move faster and more safely as "bunching" would also be reduced.
